channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Aspera Console
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Aspera Console

item.title: CVE-2022-43845|2024-09-24T10:11:00.911Z -- ibm -- aspera%20console
item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.4 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to set the HTTPOnly flag. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information from the cookie.

item.title: CVE-2021-38963|2024-09-24T10:15:56.981Z -- ibm -- aspera%20console
item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.4 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a CSV injection vulnerability. By persuading a victim to open a specially crafted file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.

item.title: CVE-2022-43575|2024-06-28T20:09:42.407Z -- ibm -- aspera%20console
item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.2 PL5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 238645.

item.title: CVE-2022-43384|2024-08-03T13:32:58.810Z -- ibm -- aspera%20console
item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.2 PL5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 238645.

item.title: CVE-2022-43575|2024-08-03T13:32:59.804Z -- ibm -- aspera%20console
item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.2 PL5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 238645.

item.title: CVE-2022-43841|2024-08-03T13:40:06.469Z -- ibm -- aspera%20console
item.description: IBM Aspera Console 3.4.0 through 3.4.2 PL9 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 239078.
